rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open space with eco-friendly materials, natural lighting, and Vastu aligned west-facing window for balance.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed for a small dining table with energy-efficient lighting and ample daylight.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Compact kitchen using eco-friendly fixtures, natural ventilation from east-facing window as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated quiet workspace with sound insulation and positioned in the northeast for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Room 1
rooms.description: Eco-friendly guest room with minimalistic design using sustainable materials; ideally placed in the north zone.

openings.description: Sustainable material door designed for natural ventilation and minimal environmental impact.
Energy-efficient window to maximize daylight while reducing heat gain, following Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with eco-friendly materials, positioned in the north-west corner for optimal Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Child's Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Cozy child's room designed with natural ventilation and soft lighting in the east zone, ensuring calm ambience.

rooms.name: Child's Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Second child's bedroom utilizing sustainable wall finishes and positioned for positive energy flow.

openings.description: Balcony window to allow natural ventilation and a view of the garden.

rooms.name: Study Room
rooms.description: Multi-purpose study area with eco-friendly insulation and positioned in the northeast for intellectual activities.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional guest room designed with compact eco-friendly furniture and efficient use of space.

openings.description: Roof window for natural light and ventilation, integrating solar energy solutions where possible.

vastu_considerations.entrance: Positioned in the south, ensuring positive energy flow.
vastu_considerations.kitchen_location: East side for balancing heat and harmony.
vastu_considerations.bedroom_orientation: Northwest corners recommended for calm sleep environment.

sustainability_features: Use of eco-friendly materials (bamboo, sustainable wood, recycled steel).
Natural ventilation design and proper insulation.
Solar panel readiness on the roof for renewable energy.
